action.action-desc: Mr. Zinke (for himself and Mr. Panetta) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Arms Export Control Act to streamline Foreign Military Sales under that Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Streamlining Foreign Military Sales Act of 2025.

section.header: Amendments to Arms Export Control Act
